TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ErrorWebPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart implements class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable
Public Class ErrorWebPart Inherits ProxyWebPart Implements ITrackingPersonalizable
type ErrorWebPart = class inherit ProxyWebPart interface ITrackingPersonalizable

summary.span: 嘗試載入或建立動態 控制項的新執行個體失敗時，為插入至網頁作為預留位置。

span.span: Inserted into a Web page as a placeholder when the attempt to load or create a new instance of a dynamic control has failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可供設定做為預留位置之 Web 組件控制項無法加入至頁面的控制項。The class is used by the Web Parts control set as a placeholder for a control that could not be added to the page. 如果控制項嘗試載入或建立的新執行個體的動態控制項區域，並嘗試中斷基於某些原因，然後呼叫方法，並插入取代控制無法控制。If the control attempts to load or create a new instance of a dynamic control in a zone, and the attempt fails for some reason, the then calls the method, and inserts an control in place of the control that failed. 插入保留原有的個人化狀態資訊可能已經存在於使用者控制項的控制項。The control is inserted to preserve previously existing personalization state information that might have existed on a control for users. 例如，假設有控制項具有可個人化的屬性，讓使用者可以儲存他們自己的郵遞區號，和控制項，可以再自動顯示天氣資訊該郵遞區號每次使用者瀏覽網頁。For example, suppose there is a control that has a personalizable property, so that users can save their own ZIP Code, and then the control can automatically display weather information for that ZIP Code each time the user visits the page. 如果在某個時間點發生問題與氣象控制項，使它無法載入特定要求期間尚未網頁的其餘未載入成功，已儲存使用者自訂的個人化資料控制項便會遺失在下一次冒用網頁的 nalization 資料會儲存。If at some point a problem occurs with the weather control so that it cannot be loaded during a specific request, and yet the rest of the page does load successfully, the custom personalization data that a user has saved for that control would be lost the next time the personalization data for the page is saved. 藉由插入控制項來取代失敗的控制，您可以通知使用者，在發生問題，並也提供一個機制來設定為保留失敗的控制項上的使用者的個人化資料，直到此問題的 Web 組件控制項您可以更正。By inserting the control in place of the failed control, you can notify the user that a problem has occurred, and also provide a mechanism for the Web Parts control set to preserve the user's personalization data on the failed control until the problem can be corrected. 類別衍生自類別，做為其中一個設計為其他類型的暫時預留位置的數種類型。The class derives from the class, as one of several types designed to be temporary placeholders for other types. 若要建立類別的執行個體控制項使用其公用建構函式。To create an instance of the class, the control uses its public constructor. 建構函式需要失敗控制項可傳遞給它，例如識別碼，原始的控制項類型的數個詳細資料 (如果失敗的控制是伺服器或使用者控制項包裝在物件)，控制項 （的原始程式檔的原始路徑如果失敗的控制項是一個使用者控制項），且識別碼為物件，如果有的話。The constructor requires several details of the failed control to be passed to it, such as the ID, the original type of the control (if the failed control is a server or user control wrapped in a object), the original path to the source file for the control (if the failed control is a user control), and the ID of a object if present. 類別具有單一的公用屬性，稱為。The class has a single public property called . 開發人員可以指派值給這個屬性會顯示在網頁中插入控制項時。Developers can assign a value to this property that will be displayed in a Web page when the control is inserted. 類別有三個受保護的方法。The class has three protected methods. 方法會採用的樣式特性物件包含無法載入控制項的區域。The method takes style characteristics from the object for the zone that contains the control that failed to load. 如果任何樣式設定存在於此物件，方法適用於他們控制項。If any style settings exist in this object, the method applies them to the control. 方法上設定數個重要的繼承的屬性控制，可防止使用者個人化控制項，藉由隱藏、 最小化、 編輯或匯出，或變更其值。The method sets several important inherited properties on the control, to prevent users from personalizing the control by hiding, minimizing, editing, or exporting it, or changing its value. 最後，方法編碼中的字串值屬性，以防止轉譯問題或指令碼的攻擊。Finally, the method encodes the value of the string in the property, to prevent rendering problems or scripting attacks.

span.para: 中的條件控制項實際插入頁面上會相當罕見，而且雖然類別可以繼承自和擴充，一些開發人員將會發現這是非常重要。您可能想要延伸此類別的其中一個原因是如果您想要自訂的外觀和行為控制項。例如，您可以覆寫方法，並設定其他樣式或上的其他屬性控制項，除了已設定的。為需要控制項以使用自訂控制項，您也必須繼承自類別並覆寫其方法。該方法的方法的值應該指派參數您的自訂屬性控制項，因為控制從數個其他位置，會呼叫這個方法，和通常會傳入不同的錯誤訊息的值。

The conditions in which an control is actually inserted into a page are relatively rare, and although the class can be inherited from and extended, few developers will find this to be of great importance. One reason you might want to extend this class is if you want to customize the appearance and behavior of the control. For example, you could override the method, and set additional style or other properties on the control, beyond those that are already set. To require the control to use a custom control, you must also inherit from the class and override its method. In that method, you should assign the value of the method's parameter to the property of your custom control, because the control calls this method from several other places, and often passes in a different error message value.

MemberSignature.Value: public ErrorWebPart (string originalID, string originalTypeName, string originalPath, string genericWebPartID);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string originalID, string originalTypeName, string originalPath, string genericWebPartID) cil managed
Public Sub New (originalID As String, originalTypeName As String, originalPath As String, genericWebPartID As String)
public: ErrorWebPart(System::String ^ originalID, System::String ^ originalTypeName, System::String ^ originalPath, System::String ^ genericWebPartID);

param.name: originalID
param.span: 已失敗控制項的控制項 ID (非唯一 ID) 字串。

span.span: A string that is the control ID (not the unique ID) of the failing control.

param.span: 如果 控制項包含在失敗的作業中，則此 ID 為其子伺服器控制項的 ID。

span.span: If a control is involved in the failure, the ID is the ID of its child server control.

param.name: originalTypeName
param.span: 已失敗控制項之 名稱的字串。

span.span: A string that is the name of the of the failed control.

param.span: 如果 控制項包含在失敗的作業中，則此型別名稱為其子伺服器控制項的型別名稱。

span.span: If a control is involved in the failure, the type name is the type of its child server control.

param.name: originalPath
param.span: 包含至使用者控制項之路徑的字串，如果包含子使用者控制項的 控制項落在失敗的作業中時。

span.span: A string that contains the path to a user control, if a control that contains a child user control is involved in the failure.

param.name: genericWebPartID
param.span: 傳回 控制項之 ID 的字串，如果控制項型別包含在載入或建立控制項的失敗作業中時。

span.span: A string that returns the ID of a control, if that type of control was involved in the failure to load or create a control.

param.span: 不是從 基底類別繼承的控制項需要這項資訊。

span.span: This is needed for controls that do not inherit from the base class.

summary.span: 初始化控制項的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項建立的新執行個體控制當它失敗時嘗試載入或建立的動態執行個體中控制項。The control creates a new instance of the control when it fails in an attempt to load or create an instance of a dynamic control. 動態控制項是以程式設計的方式，加入至網頁的控制項，或從控制項的目錄中將控制項的使用者，而不是靜態控制項中宣告的 Web 網頁的標記。Dynamic controls are controls that are added to a page programmatically, or by a user who adds the control from a catalog of controls, as opposed to static controls that are declared in the markup of a Web page. 方法只會建立基底類別，將包含失敗的控制的相關資訊的四個參數傳遞給它的執行個體。The method simply creates an instance of the base class, passing to it the four parameters that contain information about the failed control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void AddAttributesToRender(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub AddAttributesToRender (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

param.name: writer
param.span: 包含要呈現之 HTML 輸出的 。

span.span: An that contains the HTML output to be rendered.

summary.span: 套用特殊的錯誤樣式屬性至插入網頁以取代另一個控制項的 物件。

span.span: Applies special error style attributes to an object that is inserted into a page in place of another control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會採用的樣式特性 （如果有的話） 中所定義的物件區域包含控制項。The method takes the style characteristics (if any) that are defined in the object for the zone that contains an control. 樣式會套用至之前呈現的控制項。The styles are applied to the control prior to rendering.

span.para: 覆寫這個方法在衍生類別，如果開發人員想要自訂所套用的樣式特性控制項。為需要控制項以使用自訂控制項，您也必須繼承自類別並覆寫其方法。該方法的方法的值應該指派參數您的自訂屬性控制項，因為控制從數個其他位置，會呼叫這個方法，和通常會傳入特定的錯誤訊息。

This method can be overridden in a derived class, if developers want to customize the style characteristics that are applied to an control. To require the control to use a custom control, you must also inherit from the class and override its method. In that method, you should assign the value of the method's parameter to the property of your custom control, because the control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void EndLoadPersonalization() cil managed
abstract member EndLoadPersonalization : unit -> unit override this.EndLoadPersonalization : unit -> unit

summary.span: 呈現之前在 控制項上設定幾個重要的屬性，可防止使用者將控制項個人化。

span.span: Sets several important properties on the control prior to rendering, to prevent users from being able to personalize the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法上設定內容控制轉譯之前。The method sets properties on an control before it is rendered. 這些屬性會防止使用者隱藏、 最小化、 編輯或匯出控制項，或變更其值。These properties prevent users from hiding, minimizing, editing, or exporting the control, or changing its value. 不過，使用者可以關閉或刪除控制項執行個體。However, users can close or delete an control instance.

span.para: 這個方法會覆寫中繼承控制項。開發人員可能會想要覆寫方法以設定其他屬性上的控制項，例如，預設屬性值。為需要控制項以使用自訂控制項，您也必須繼承自類別並覆寫其方法。該方法的方法的值應該指派參數您的自訂屬性控制項，因為控制從數個其他位置，會呼叫這個方法，和通常會傳入特定的錯誤訊息。

This method can be overridden in an inherited control. Developers might want to override the method to set additional properties on the control, such as a default property value. To require the control to use a custom control, you must also inherit from the class and override its method. In that method, you should assign the value of the method's parameter to the property of your custom control, because the control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ErrorMessage { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ErrorMessage : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示在 Web 網頁上的錯誤訊息，以取代無法順利加入至網頁的控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets the error message that is displayed in a Web page in place of a control that could not be successfully added to the page.

value.span: 包含錯誤訊息文字的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the text of the error message.

value.span: 預設值為文化特性錯誤訊息。

span.span: The default value is a culture-specific error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以指派值由開發人員，以便自訂錯誤訊息會顯示在時間點其中控制項插入頁面。The property can be assigned a value by a developer, so that a custom error message is displayed at the point where the control is inserted into a page.

span.para: 開發人員可以指派預設值給屬性，方法是擴充類別並在建構函式或透過覆寫方法中，指派給屬性的預設值。為需要控制項以使用自訂控制項，您也必須繼承自類別並覆寫其方法。該方法的方法的值應該指派參數您的自訂屬性控制項，因為控制從數個其他位置，會呼叫這個方法，和通常會傳入特定的錯誤訊息。

Developers can assign a default value to the property by extending the class and, in the constructor or in an overridden method, assigning a default value to the property. To require the control to use a custom control, you must also inherit from the class and override its method. In that method, you should assign the value of the method's parameter to the property of your custom control, because the control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void RenderContents (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);

Protected Friend Overrides Sub RenderContents (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

span.span: An that encodes the error message.

summary.span: 將 屬性的字串值編碼。

span.span: Encodes the string value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將編碼的字串指派給屬性，以確保它轉譯為正常運作，並以防止指令碼資料隱碼攻擊。The method encodes the string assigned to the property to ensure that it renders properly, and to protect against script injection attacks.
